views.markdown:
CyberKit MobileMiniBrowser allows you to test the CyberKit backport of newer WebKit in a minimal browser.

This release is for iOS 12. If you're not on iOS 12, there are other releases available.

Please see issue #2 on GitHub for current status.

If you have not configured CyberKit before, please see GitHub for jetsam configuration instructions.
Failure to complete this step will result in a crash.
Updated WebKit from 7616.1.7 branch to 7616.1.12 branch, bundle internationalization instead of using potentially older system data, and other iOS 12 work
Progress on iOS 13 support and initial release of CyberKit Fennec (Client)
Cleaned up codebase and introduced theoretical iOS 13 support
Change default user agent string to Safari for better site results
Removed most powerful entitlements, now allowing for theoretical iOS 15+ support
